00011 #if !defined(INCL_PLFILTERLIGHTNESS)
00012 #define INCL_PLFILTERLIGHTNESS
00013 
00014 #if _MSC_VER > 1000
00015 #pragma once
00016 #endif // _MSC_VER > 1000
00017 
00018 #include "plfilter.h"
00019 
00020 class PLBmp;
00021 
00022 //! Filter that changes the lightness of a 32 bpp bitmap. lightness
00023 //! values must be in the range -100..100. A value of 0 leaves the 
00024 //! image unchanged.
00025 class PLFilterLightness : public PLFilter  
00026 {
00027 public:
00028   //!
00029         PLFilterLightness (int lightness);
00030   
00031   //!
00032         virtual ~PLFilterLightness();
00033 
00034   //!
00035   virtual void Apply(PLBmpBase *pBmpSource, PLBmp* pBmpDest) const;
00036 
00037 protected:
00038     int m_lightness;
00039 };
00040 #endif
00041
